text: @HillaryClinton Why is it Covid-19 seems to be the only of death now? Is Covid drinking and driving? Is Covid pulling the trigger in gunshot deaths? The elderly are most acceptable to Covid-19 yet @NYGovCuomo forcred nursing homes to take in Covid patients...why? Ask the right questions!
